Professional Profile
A motivated and results-driven professional with a solid background in sales, customer service and management, who enjoys being part of, as well as leading, an enthusiastic and successful team. Able to work well on own initiative and thrive in challenging working environments, possessing a strong ability to perform effectively to achieve tight deadlines and targets.
Objective
Currently looking for a new job opportunity in a prolific working environment, one which will capitalize on my skills and experience, as acquired in corporate and privately-owned companies.
Helping companies to get ahead with compliant and highly efficient ERP solutions. R Catalin Stoenescu
10 Hosking Close, CH49 0WG,
Upton, Wirral
Telephone: 07576056381 (Mobile)
Email: catalin.stoenescu@yahoo.com
Professional Profile
A motivated and results-driven professional with a solid background in sales, customer service and management, who enjoys being part of, as well as leading, an enthusiastic and successful team. Able to work well on own initiative and thrive in challenging working environments, possessing a strong ability to perform effectively to achieve tight deadlines and targets.
Objective
Currently looking for a new job opportunity in a prolific working environment, one which will capitalize on my skills and experience, as acquired in corporate and privately-owned companies.
Helping companies to get ahead with compliant and highly efficient ERP solutions. Robosol specialise in Microsoft Dynamics ERP systems for Manufacturing and Distribution operations.
Robosol is a Microsoft Gold partner specialising in Microsoft Dynamics Nav, Ax and Dynamics CRM implementations. We have extensively worked with Pharmaceutical, FMCG, Cosmetics, Fashion, Engineering and luggage industries implementing ERP, Ecommerce and Intranet solutions.
Responsibilities:
Attending networking events, business events and exhibitions, representing and promoting the Robosol brand
Selling Microsoft products and services using solid arguments to prospective customers.
Maintaining positive business relationships to ensure future sales and cross-selling
Cold calling/ Cold emailing potential customers and self-generate leads
Following up new business opportunities and setting up meetings (On site or online)
Planning and preparing presentations/demos to future or existing customers
Providing management with feedback and solutions to improve efficiency
Consistently exceeding monthly sales targets, creating customer portfolio, and generating income and long-lasting business relationships.
Increase the client portfolio
Developing quotes and proposals for clients.
Researching organizations and individuals to find new opportunities.
Contacting potential clients to establish rapport and arrange meetings.
Attending conferences, meetings, and industry events
Finding and developing new markets and partnerships to improve sales and increase productivity.
FairFX is an international payment services provider, offering services to customers in the UK since2007. It provides international money transfer services, a prepaid currency card and travel cash to personal and business customers. 
FairFX was named as one of 1000 Companies to Inspire Britain by London Stock Exchange in 2013and registered on the AIM market of the London Stock Exchange in August 2014.
Responsibilities:
Helping companies to manage and control their staff expenses providing cost-effective methods to cap company staff spends and move away from cash and receipts.
We specialize in expense and payment analysis for a diverse range of organizations with the aim of fully understanding a business's needs.
Attending networking events and business events and follow up with the prospects.
Cold calling potential customers and self-generating sales
Assisting clients in completing the necessary documents to open the business account and onboard them as customers.
Consistently exceeding monthly sales targets
Responsibilities:
An instrumental member of the store team, working towards achieving store and personal targets, in turn supporting the achievement of business plans and objectives.
Dealing with challenging customers, managing contentious situations and providing comprehensive technical information where required, assisting the client with any issues they might be experiencing.
Responsible representing the Virgin Media brand at all times, raising awareness and acting in line with brand values, propositions and promise.
Consistently exceeding monthly sales targets and creating customer portfolio.
Maximizing sales, cross sales and up sell opportunities at all times.
Supporting, training and coaching colleagues to improve business.
Arranging credit checks, contract agreements, marketing and promotional sales.
Banking, audit, quality of process checks, stock control and merchandising guide

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
